#summary Getting Started.

== redtamarin v0.3.0 ==

download one of the zip for your system (see [http://code.google.com/p/redtamarin/downloads/list downloads] tab), and unzip it, you should get

{{{
..
 |_ redtamarin_0.3.0.940_OSX  <- for OS X
      |_ asc.jar
      |_ builtin.abc
      |_ changelog.txt
      |_ license.txt
      |_ readme.txt
      |_ redshell                          <- release version
      |_ redshell_d                        <- debugger version
      |_ toplevel.abc

}}}
